note.p: Journalist and newspaper proprietor. Fellow of the Royal Horticultural Society. Editor of the journal of the Midland Union of Scientific and Literary Societies, the Midland Naturalist.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/2947/46/17)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 January 2014)

note.term: Midland Union of Natural History Societies
